function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High morbidity rate for elderly and patients with co-morbidities due to compromised natural immunity.","Impact":"Increased risk of severe illness and fatalities in vulnerable populations.","Mitigation":"Enhancing the natural immunity through targeted interventions and protective measures.","Technologies":"Immunomodulators, vaccination, and personalized healthcare technologies.","People":"Elderly patients, cancer patients, patients with asthma, diabetes, high blood pressure, and cardiac diseases.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health agencies, and medical researchers."},{"Description":"Lack of specific medicine or vaccine to control COVID-19.","Impact":"Inability to effectively treat and prevent the spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Accelerating research and development of vaccines and effective antiviral treatments.","Technologies":"Vaccine development, drug discovery technologies, and biopharmaceutical advancements.","People":"Global public health organizations, pharmaceutical companies, and research institutions.","Owner":"Biomedical researchers, pharmaceutical companies, and global health organizations."},{"Description":"Reliance on social lockdown as the only preventive measure for COVID-19 control.","Impact":"Social and economic disruption, mental health effects, and logistical challenges for essential activities.","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted public health measures, improving testing and contact tracing capabilities, and promoting vaccination.","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, rapid testing technologies, and vaccination distribution systems.","People":"General population, essential workers, vulnerable individuals.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and community leaders."}]}
